title: Game Crashes After Champ Select
body: anyone having an issue with the game crashing after champ select ive tried to reinstall the game everything and still crashes on me

replies.body: I'd like to help but need some more details, like what you mean exactly by crash.  Are you receiving any error messages?  Is is during champion select, or when the game is loading?  Let me know with more specifics, and I'm happy to assist!
as soon as we all pick champs and it switches over to the loading screen before the match it crashes.. the crash report says LOL_PublicV46p6jp3.dmp * and NKMT71J1.xml * but thats it..
